category.name: preflight
category.item: Always read html2pptx.md or ooxml.md entirely before touching their workflows.
Verify NODE_PATH resolves to npm root before running the JS builder.
Confirm markitdown, pptxgenjs, playwright, react-icons, LibreOffice, and Poppler are installed.

category.name: authoring
category.item: Shared CSS file may only declare custom properties; no selectors or classes.
Slides must use row/col/fit helpers (no flexbox) and semantic headings/lists.
Placeholders for charts/tables require gray background plus class="placeholder".

category.name: validation
category.item: Thumbnail grid review looks for cutoff text, overlap, margins, and contrast problems.
replace.py clears every shape not explicitly set in replacement JSONâ€”verify shape lists carefully.
validate.py must pass before repacking OOXML edits.

category.name: governance
category.item: Log checksums or control-plane hashes when exporting final decks to align with guardrails-end workflows.
Reference hilbert fixed-point proofs when reasoning about iterative guardrail enforcement on PPTX pipelines.
